page.title: 14Religion
page.content: {Church of England}The tendency from the 1970's has been to gather several churches under the care of one vicar.Newton on Trent - C13 of St Peter in diocese of Lincoln; joined in a plurality with Kettlethorpe Torksey and Marton in care of Rev L Salt. Average Sunday congregation 7 and lO Sunday School children. Dunham on Trent - Church of St Oswald in diocese of Southwell has C15 Lantern Tower. The Rev John Brown has charge over it in plurality with the churches of Fledborough Ragnall abd Darlton. Average congregation 6.Sunday School weekly. The Cl5 Church of St Gregory at Fledborough has some fine medieval glassNo heat or light installed so only 2 services a month mid morning. Average congregation 4. Charles Kingsley, author of 'Water Babies' .
